briefdescription.para: Dummy property with no effect on item.
Composition data defined properties for different item types.
The MarkerMode enum is the old QGIS 2.x arrow marker mode.
addItemsFromCompositionXml parse a QGIS 2.x composition XML in the parentElement, converts the 2.x items to the new layout elements and add them to the layout

parameterdescription.para: where the items will be added
if true element position is translated to position

simplesect.para: list of layout object items that have been added to the layout

briefdescription.para: Convert a composition template document to a layout template.

briefdescription.para: createLayoutFromCompositionXml is a factory that creates layout instances from a QGIS 2.x XML composition parentElement and a QGIS project
Check if the given document is a composition template.

simplesect.para: true if the document is a composition template

briefdescription.para: Reads parameter that are not subclass specific in document. Usually called from readXml methods of subclasses.
